summary: Tested Send Invoice form validation per user bug report. Form is working correctly - all validation scenarios pass. User's 'field required' error is likely a UX misunderstanding: they must CLICK a search result to select a matter, not just type in the search field.

The search field shows text but no matter is selected until a dropdown result is clicked
Selected matters appear as badges above the search field - users may not notice this visual feedback
